sourcesContent:
export const homeObjOne = {
    id: 'algorithm',
    lightBg: false,
    lightText: true,
    lightTextDesc: true,
    topLine: 'Sorting Algorithms',
    headline: 'What are Sorting Algorithms?',
    description:
    'A Sorting Algorithm rearranges the members of an array or list based on a comparison operator on the elements. In the respective data structure, the comparison operator is employed to determine the new order of elements. Here we visualize Bubble Sort, Insertion Sort, Merge Sort, Quick Sort, Selection Sort, and Heap Sort.',
    buttonLabel: 'Visualize now',
    imgStart: false,
    img: require('../../images/svg-1.svg').default,
    alt: 'Sorting Algo',
    dark: true,
    primary: true,
    darkText: false,

};


export const homeObjTwo = {
    id: 'about',
    lightBg: true,
    lightText: false,
    lightTextDesc: false,
    topLine: 'About Visualize-Algo',
    headline: 'The main objective of this site',
    description:
    'This algorithm simulator is designed to teach students about data structures through visualization, allowing them to test their understanding of basic data structures and algorithms. The simulator is a work in progress that will include the visualization of different algorithms.',
    buttonLabel: 'Learn more',
    imgStart: true,
    img: require('../../images/svg-2.svg').default,
    alt: 'About',
    dark: false,
    primary: false,
    darkText: true,

};

export const homeObjThree = {
    id: 'signup',
    lightBg: true,
    lightText: false,
    lightTextDesc: false,
    topLine: 'Join with us',
    headline: 'Create an account',
    description:
    "All you need to do is add your information and you're ready to go.",
    buttonLabel: 'Start now',
    imgStart: false,
    img: require('../../images/svg-3.svg').default,
    alt: 'Sorting Algo',
    dark: false,
    primary: false,
    darkText: true,

};
